name: Casa de Suenos - Angelito - Churchill
additionalNotes:
Hidden in a valley in the Dominican lies an industrious field of lush green leaves that are born from the soil passed down from six generations of the De Los Reyes family. Smiling faces and diligent hands meticulously grow and harvest select leaves that will undergo great scrutiny and tender care as 
“El Soñador” was the first inspiration that captured the hearts of afficionados, just like you, who understand and appreciate the complexity of a delicious, well balanced stick.  Released in November of 2019, El Soñador continues to mature and impress.  Made with all Dominican tobacco El Soñador is undoubtedly what our dreams here at Casa de Sueños are made of.
